Smart Trash Can: A smart trash can that can detect the type of waste and separate it automatically.
Self-Stirring Trash Can: A trash can that stirs its contents to ensure everything gets properly mixed and broken down.
Trash Can with Air Purifying Filters: A trash can that purifies the air around it by removing pollutants and odors.
Interactive Trash Can: A trash can that responds to voice commands and can be controlled through a smartphone app.
Trash Can with Built-in Composter: A trash can that composts food waste and turns it into nutrient-rich soil.
